verbose_text: Navbeta2 knockdown improved cognition and restored sodium current density in hippocampal neurons and neuronal activity in APP / PS1 mice, whereas presenilin / secretase mediated cleavage of the Navbeta2-CTF (Navbeta2-C-terminal fragment) regulates cell adhesion and migration.
evidence: presenilin/secretase-mediated cleavage of the Navbeta2-CTF (Navbeta2-C-terminal fragment) regulates cell adhesion
